text: Edmond Malinvaud (25 April 1923 – 7 March 2015) was a French economist. He was the first president of the Pontifical Academy of Social Sciences. He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 1988. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2015 deaths Category:French economists Category:Members of Academia Europaea Category:People from Limoges Category:Alumni of the École Polytechnique
title: Edmond Malinvaud
